description: Try our easy to follow Vanilla & White Chocolate Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Vanilla & White Chocolate Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Make the icing. Put the cream cheese, chocolate, butter, vanilla and icing sugar in a bowl and beat until smooth and creamy. Spread over the tops of the cakes. Scatter with plenty of white chocolate curls and dust with extra icing sugar to decorate.
